title: Micrometer support for fully qualified metrics names
body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/discussions/27983
Originally posted by **arpit-gupta213** September 16, 2022 I am trying to migrate from microprofile to micrometer metrics in my project. The current implementation(microprofile) uses the fully qualified metrics names. For example, if I have a metrics with name "totalCount" in the class com.org.github.MicrometerMetrics the way I am accessing the metrics is by using the key: "**com.org.github.MicrometerMetrics.totalCount**" When I switched to micrometer the default names of metrics changes from the fully qualified names to just the metrics name. Meaning now I have to access the metrics using the key: "**totalCount**" This makes the migration complex as I would have to change the name of the metrics to make them meaningful without the fully qualified name and also I have to change the keys to access the metrics Is there a way in micrometer to get the metrics by fully qualified names which include package name and class name along with the metrics name?
